recoverable_profit.label: Recoverable Profit (30d)
recoverable_profit.tooltip: Projected net profit from recommended groups this month. Calculated as: Revenue × Margin − Sending Costs − Incentives.

ready_groups.label: Ready Groups Today
ready_groups.tooltip: Number of customer groups worth acting on now. Groups meet minimum thresholds for size and comeback probability.

expected_reactivations.label: Expected Reactivations
expected_reactivations.tooltip: How many people we expect to come back if we send the recommended messages. Based on historical reactivation rates per group.

comeback_odds.label: Come-Back Odds
comeback_odds.tooltip:
What it is: A 0–100 score estimating how likely this group is to return if we reach out now.

How we compute: Combines past orders, recent activity, time away, spend signals, and satisfaction into one number.

Why it matters: Higher odds → higher chance of immediate revenue from win-back.

last_seen.label: Last Seen
last_seen.tooltip: Average days since the group's last order. Shorter is 'warm', longer is 'cold'.

activity.label: Activity
activity.tooltip: How much time this group spends with us (app/web) and devices used. It's a proxy for engagement.

avg_spend.label: Avg Spend
avg_spend.tooltip: Average money per purchase for this group (or a proxy built from cashback/coupons/spend uplift).

months_with_brand.label: Months with Brand
months_with_brand.tooltip: Average tenure. Longer = stronger relationship; deserves respectful tone and fewer discounts.

net_profit.label: Net Profit
net_profit.tooltip: Projected profit after margin, sending costs, and any incentives, over 30 days.

people.label: People
people.tooltip: Number of customers in this group.

Premium.label: Premium
Premium.one_liner: High activity and recently lapsed—lead with curation, not discounts.
Premium.guidance: Lead with curation and quality. Avoid generic discounts or mass-market messaging.

ValueSensitive.label: Value-Sensitive
ValueSensitive.one_liner: Responds to value—try bundles/cashback, keep it light.
ValueSensitive.guidance: Lead with value proposition and clear savings. Keep incentives light.

Loyalist.label: Loyalist
Loyalist.one_liner: Long relationship—remind and appreciate, no discount needed.
Loyalist.guidance: Acknowledge their history and offer exclusive benefits. Don't treat them like new customers.

AtRisk.label: At-Risk
AtRisk.one_liner: Close to churning—one-tap reorder, reduce friction.
AtRisk.guidance: Address concerns directly and offer immediate value. Quick restart, low friction.

ServiceSensitive.label: Service-Sensitive
ServiceSensitive.one_liner: Reassure: faster delivery, better tracking, small apology credit.
ServiceSensitive.guidance: Highlight support quality and problem resolution. 'We fixed it' message works well.

reactivation_rate.definition: % of this group we expect to return after outreach.

margin.definition: % of sales kept after cost of goods.

incentive.definition: Discount/credit offered to nudge a purchase; we keep it light.

eval.definition: Automated quality/safety review (0–5 stars) before we show copy.

copy_rules.title: How We Write
copy_rules.tone: Helpful, clear, benefit-first. No hype, no dark patterns.
safety_rules: Never use: 'guaranteed', 'last chance', 'only today', 'free for everyone'
No dark patterns or high-pressure tactics

empty_states.no_data: We couldn't find your dataset. Upload a CSV/XLSX with the sample headers.
empty_states.no_groups: No groups meet the bar today. Try adjusting reactivation assumptions or check again tomorrow.
empty_states.no_group_selected: No group selected. Please choose a group from the Overview or Groups page.
empty_states.message_failed_eval: We couldn't pass safety/quality. Try Service Fix tone or Short length.
empty_states.whatsapp_blocked: WhatsApp requires approved templates and opt-in. Upload a template or switch to Email/Push.
